relation: Their campus safety statement is Provide a safe and secure environment for our students, faculty, staff, and visitors. And they take it seriously.

they have four sororities, which are, Alpha Sigma Tau Sorority, Gamma Upsilon Sorority, Theta Phi Alpha Sorority, and Sigma Sigma Sigma Sorority. They also have six fraternities, which are, Alpha Phi Alpha, Kappa Alpha Psi, Kappa Theta, Sigma Alpha Epsilon, Sigma Lambda, and Tau Kappa Epsilon fraternity
There currently are 44 clubs and organizations on campus. From chess, school newspaper and more.

Dining on campus provides a social experience essential to campus life. It provides opportunities to gather with friends, take study breaks, hang out, relax and unwind after a hard day of classes and activities.
Saint Leo's campus is beautiful and comfortable - the perfect spot to be for your four year college experience.
Definitely always have options. You never know if you'll change your mind on what school you'll want to attend. Don't let distance be a barrier.
Saint Leo University has a very home feeling. It has very supportive staff. They will do their best to help you succeed.
pageTitle: Saint Leo University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {355990=I have enrolled and I begin classes on April 29, 2013. The advisors have been awesome and have really answered all my questions about everything. They have made this whole process very easy., 355463=Have not yet began. I will begin on April 29th., 490375=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 207464=I have been enrolled at Saint Leo (Adult Center, Georgia) since March 2012 and can't express how much I've appreciated the professionalism of the instructors. As a non-traditional student I was apprehensive about returning to school. I haven't regretted my decision!, 89042=campus was founded in 1889., 149561=Staff has been very helpful in transitioning from my community college. Financial aid representative is easy to work with and informative. Look forward to starting my first semester Fall 2012., 147549=I will be attending Saint Leo in the fall of 2012 as a freshman., 412024=As a commuter, a meal plan is not required. That being said, I have gone into the main dining area a few times. The food is great; it is buffet style. The only draw back for commuters and the main dining area is the price, $10 as of 2013. The Lion's Lair is more reasonable on price but it is not a buffet and there are limited options. However, it offers grilled items, deli items, snacks, drinks, and items needed for your dorm if you live on campus.}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot I AM LEARNING A LOT AT ST LEO AND THE PROFESSORS ARE REALLY HELPFUL AND WANT YOU TO SUCEED Login to rate or flag the reviews ashley 06/09/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 14 out of 16 people found this review useful. 3 of 125 Categories Comments Great for these types of students any student who wants to learn in a great environment this school is for you Tips for prospective students make sure you have really good test scores,its not that hard to get accepted,good luck Login to rate or flag the reviews Leonora from Tampa, FL 01/08/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 14 out of 15 people found this review useful.
